001package edu.pdx.cs410J.airline;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
005import org.xml.sax.SAXParseException;
006
007import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder;
008import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory;
009import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
013
014class AirlineXmlHelperTest {
015
016  @Test
017  void canParseValidXmlFile() throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException, SAXException {
018    AirlineXmlHelper helper = new AirlineXmlHelper();
019
020
021    DocumentBuilderFactory factory =
022      DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
023    factory.setValidating(true);
024
025    DocumentBuilder builder =
026      factory.newDocumentBuilder();
027    builder.setErrorHandler(helper);
028    builder.setEntityResolver(helper);
029
030    builder.parse(this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("valid-airline.xml"));
031  }
032
033  @Test
034  void cantParseInvalidXmlFile() throws ParserConfigurationException {
035    AirlineXmlHelper helper = new AirlineXmlHelper();
036
037
038    DocumentBuilderFactory factory =
039      DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
040    factory.setValidating(true);
041
042    DocumentBuilder builder =
043      factory.newDocumentBuilder();
044    builder.setErrorHandler(helper);
045    builder.setEntityResolver(helper);
046
047    assertThrows(SAXParseException.class, () ->
048      builder.parse(this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("invalid-airline.xml"))
049    );
050  }
051
052}
